items.text: Here is a blog post on how to record audio using the MediaRecorder.
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: I haven't tried recording phone call's but there is a option in MediaRecorder AudioSource for:
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: VOICE_CALL - Voice call uplink + downlink audio source
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: VOICE_DOWNLINK - Voice call downlink (Rx) audio source
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: VOICE_UPLINK - Voice call uplink (Tx) audio source
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: I am using mic to record calls for better support and compatibility.
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: I am using mic to record phone audio and also use the Telephony manager to find the calling state.
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow

items.text: I am using mic to record phone audio and also use the Telephony manager to find the calling state.
items.href: Android Recording Incoming and Outgoing Calls - Stack Overflow
